name: dev.arctic.pkvault
description: Immutable Pokémon storage for Gens I to IX

scripts.dev:reimage: echo "You must type exactly 'I agree.' to continue." && echo "This will delete your database containing ALL of your PKVault index data (not Pokémon save data)." && read -p "Confirmation: " confirm && [ "$confirm" = "I agree." ] && rm ./data/data.* ; prisma generate && prisma db push --force-reset || echo "Aborted: User didn't agree."
